ji_US {
    AddressFormat { 
        PostalFormat { "%d%N%f%N%d%N%b%N%s %h 5e %r%N%C%z %T%N%c%N" }
    }
    CountryISBNNumber { "840" }
    CountryNumber { "840" }
    CurrencyElements { 
            "$",
            "USD ",
            ".",
    }
    Identification { 
        Title { "Yiddish Language locale" }
        Source { "http://www.uyip.org/" }
        Address { "" }
        Contact { "Pablo Saratxaga" }
        Email { "pablo@mandrakesoft.com" }
        Telephone { "" }
        Fax { "" }
        Language { "yi" }
        Territory { "US" }
        Audience { "" }
        Application { "" }
        Abbreviation { "" }
        Revision { "0.3" }
        Date { "2001-01-28" }
    }
    LanguageLibraryUse { "yid" }
    Measurement { "American" }
    Messages { 
        YesExpression { "^[Yy\u05D9].*" }
        NoExpression { "^[Nn\u05E0\u05E7].*" }
        YesStr { "\u05D9\u05D0\u05B7" }
        NoStr { "\u05E7\u05F2\u05DF" }
    }
    NameFormat { 
        NamePattern { "%d%t%g%t%m%t%f" }
        GeneralSalutaion { "" }
        ShortSalutationMr { "Mr." }
        ShortSalutationMiss { "Miss." }
        ShortSalutationMrs { "Mrs." }
        LongSalutationMr { "" }
        LongSalutationMiss { "Ms." }
        LongSalutationMrs { "" }
    }
    NumberElements { 
            ".",
            ",",
            ";",
            "%",
            "0",
            "#",
            "-",
            "E",
            "\u2030",
            "\u221E",
            "\uFFFD",
    }
    NumberPatterns { 
            "#,##0.###;-#,##0.###",
            "\u00A4 #,##0.00;\u00A4 #,##0.00-",
            "#,##0%",
    }
    TelephoneFormat { 
        InternationalFormat { "+%c (%a) %l" }
        DomesticFormat { "" }
        InternationalDialCode { "11" }
        InternationalPrefix { "1" }
    }
    calendar{
        gregorian{
            AmPmMarkers{
                    "AM",
                    "PM",
            }
            DateTimePatterns{
                    "hh:mm:ss %P",
                    "HH:mm:ss",
                    "HH:mm:ss",
                    "HH:mm:ss",
                    "z  yyyy MMM dd EEE",
                    "z HH:mm:ss yyyy MMM dd EEE",
                    "dd/MMMM/yy",
                    "dd/MMMM/yy",
                    "{0} {1}",
            }
            dayNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "\u05D6\u05D5\u05E0'",
                            "\u05DE\u05D0\u05B8\u05E0'",
                            "\u05D3\u05D9\u05E0'",
                            "\u05DE\u05D9\u05D8'",
                            "\u05D3\u05D0\u05B8\u05E0'",
                            "\u05E4\u05BF\u05E8\u05F2\u05B7'",
                            "\u05E9\u05D1\u05EA",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "\u05D6\u05D5\u05E0\u05D8\u05D9\u05E7",
                            "\u05DE\u05D0\u05B8\u05E0\u05D8\u05D9\u05E7",
                            "\u05D3\u05D9\u05E0\u05E1\u05D8\u05D9\u05E7",
                            "\u05DE\u05D9\u05D8\u05F0\u05D0\u05B8\u05DA",
                            "\u05D3\u05D0\u05B8\u05E0\u05E2\u05E8\u05E9\u05D8\u05D9\u05E7",
                            "\u05E4\u05BF\u05E8\u05F2\u05B7\u05D8\u05D9\u05E7",
                            "\u05E9\u05D1\u05EA",
                    }
                }
            }
            monthNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "\u05D9\u05D0\u05B7\u05E0'",
                            "\u05E4\u05BF\u05E2\u05D1'",
                            "\u05DE\u05D0\u05B7\u05E8'",
                            "\u05D0\u05B7\u05E4\u05BC\u05E8'",
                            "\u05DE\u05F2\u05B7",
                            "\u05D9\u05D5\u05E0'",
                            "\u05D9\u05D5\u05DC'",
                            "\u05D0\u05F1\u05D2'",
                            "\u05E1\u05E2\u05E4\u05BC'",
                            "\u05D0\u05B8\u05E7\u05D8'",
                            "\u05E0\u05D0\u05B8\u05F0'",
                            "\u05D3\u05E2\u05E6'",
                            "",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "\u05D9\u05D0\u05B7\u05E0\u05D5\u05D0\u05B7\u05E8",
                            "\u05E4\u05BF\u05E2\u05D1\u05E8\u05D5\u05D0\u05B7\u05E8",
                            "\u05DE\u05D0\u05B7\u05E8\u05E5",
                            "\u05D0\u05B7\u05E4\u05BC\u05E8\u05D9\u05DC",
                            "\u05DE\u05F2\u05B7",
                            "\u05D9\u05D5\u05E0\u05D9",
                            "\u05D9\u05D5\u05DC\u05D9",
                            "\u05D0\u05F1\u05D2\u05E1\u05D8",
                            "\u05E1\u05E2\u05E4\u05BC\u05D8\u05E2\u05DE\u05D1\u05E2\u05E8",
                            "\u05D0\u05B8\u05E7\u05D8\u05D0\u05B8\u05D1\u05E2\u05E8",
                            "\u05E0A\u05B8\u05F0\u05E2\u05DE\u05D1\u05E2\u05E8",
                            "\u05D3\u05E6\u05DE\u05D1\u05E8",
                            "",
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
